sources.title: The Philadelphia Experiment | Full Movie | Action Adventure | Michael ParÃ©
sources.description:
When an attempt to recreate a decades-old government experiment goes horribly wrong, it rips a hole in the fabric of space/time and causes the USS Eldridge to reappear, a WWII battleship that famously vanished over 70 years ago.  But when the ship begins tearing its way through cites across the continent, the Eldridgeâ€™s sole survivor must band together with his physicist granddaughter to stop the ship before it tears the Earth apart.
2012.  Stars: Nicholas Lea, Michael ParÃ©, Ryan Robbins, Malcolm McDowell

metadata.Plot: In 1943, the United States tests an anti-radar system to make the U.S. Navy ships invisible to the enemy. Dr. James Longstreet uses his experiment in the destroyer escort USS Eldridge that disappears from Philadelphia. The sailors David Herdeg and his best friend Jim Parker are projected to 1984, where they meet Allison Hayes. They unsuccessfully try to contact their base and out of the blue Jimmy disappears in a hospital. Allison helps David to visit Jimmy's wife Pamela, but Jimmy refuses to see him. Now David's only hope is meeting Dr. James Longstreet to learn what to do. Will he succeed?
metadata.Writer: Michael Janover, William Gray, Wallace C. Bennett
metadata.Actors: Michael ParÃ©, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas
